common_0040_head_teacher_03:
On behalf of the academy, I must apologize for
the late arrival of your enrollment documents.[VAR 0114(002C)]
common_0040_head_teacher_04: Ah. And also for my delay in introducing myself.[VAR 0114(002C)]
common_0040_head_teacher_05:
I am the director of Naranja Academy. You may
call me Mr. Clavell.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0040_head_teacher_11:
I am the director of Uva Academy. You may call
me Mr. Clavell.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0040_mama_01:
The director?! And you came in person to help
my [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0803)]sondaughter with h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser first day?[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0040_head_teacher_06:
Well, I am responsible for the entire academy—
including any failures on its part...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0040_head_teacher_07:
So here at last are the enrollment documents
that should have already been delivered to you.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0040_mama_03:
Since you’ve come all this way, can I at least
offer you a cup of tea?[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0040_head_teacher_08: Ah, no need to trouble yourself...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0040_mama_04:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)], I’ve got a thing or
two\r
to\r
discuss\r
with\r
the\r
director here.[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0040_mama_05:
Why don’t you head back up to [VAR COLOR(0006)]your room[VAR COLOR(0000)] and
finish getting ready for school? You’ll need your\r
bag—and your hat as well![VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0040_mama_06:
Now, Mr. Clavell, you simply must join me for
a cuppa. This way...[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0040_head_teacher_09: Well, how can I refuse such a kind offer?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0040_head_teacher_10:
Is your room upstairs? No need to concern
yourself with me. Go on.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0040_mama_07:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Off you pop, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Go to
[VAR COLOR(0006)]your[VAR COLOR(0000)]\r
[VAR COLOR(0006)]room[VAR COLOR(0000)]\r
and\r
get\r
yourself\r
ready for school.\c
You need your bag—and your hat, too![VAR 0114(002B)]
